members.joinCircumstances: Leader and founder of the crew
Revealed as Buggy's Chief of Staff and fights on his behalf

keyMoments.title: Cabaji Revealed as Chief of Staff
keyMoments.description: Cabaji is introduced as the Chief of Staff of the Buggy Pirates and challenges the Straw Hats to combat.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the hierarchy within Buggy's crew and introduces his second-in-command.

keyMoments.title: Chief of Staff Defeated
keyMoments.description: Cabaji, the crew's Chief of Staff, is defeated by Roronoa Zoro despite using dirty tactics.
keyMoments.significance: Major blow to the Buggy Pirates' fighting force in Orange Town.

ships.description: Buggy's pirate ship with a circus tent theme

jollyRoger.description: A clown skull with a red nose and crossbones behind it

keyMoments.title: Zoro Defeats Cabaji
keyMoments.description: Zoro demonstrates the crew's strength by defeating Buggy's Chief of Staff with his Oni Giri technique.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the growing power of the fledgling Straw Hat crew.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
